translation: Good evening, everyone.
transcript: 呃，大家晚上好。

translation: Today we are going to talk about a serious topic.
transcript: 今天呢，我们是讲一个稍微严肃一点儿的话题哈。

translation: It is about studying.
transcript: 是关于学习的。

translation: However, in fact, as it was said before, the work can be so fun.
transcript: 但其实前面讲了说工作都可以这么好玩儿。

translation: I believe that actually we can also make learning very fun.
transcript: 我相信其实我们其实做好了也可以让学习挺好玩儿的。

translation: First of all, I would like to ask one question: How many of you believe that you love study?
transcript: 那我想先问一个问题哈，呃在座的各位有多少人觉得自己是喜欢学习的？

translation: Please raise your hands.
transcript: 请举一下手。

translation: Ok, we have seen that most audiences have raised hands, but there are still a few people who haven't. So, for those audiences who haven't raised your hands, don't you come to this room for avoiding summer heat, do you?
transcript: 好，我们看到应该大多数人都举手了哈，那有几个没举手的是来避暑的，是吧？

translation: Well, everyone here has enthusiasm for study.
transcript: 呵呵，好，呃那大家都是爱学习的人。

translation: We all know that there are many challenges hindering study.
transcript: 我们都知道说学习其实今天还是有很多挑战的。

translation: Ah, can you tell me what challenges are you facing now?
transcript: 啊，能告诉我说，您现在在学习上会面临哪些挑战吗？

translation: Ok. I may not see every one's face so clearly.
transcript: 可以因为我看不看不太清楚啊。

translation: Please speak up so that we can learn about the challenges you are facing.
transcript: 你可以大声的说出来，我们听。

translation: Oh, there are too many goals.
transcript: 哦目标太多。

translation: Some people say that there are too many books.
transcript: 有人说是书太多了，啊。

translation: Ah, someone says that as there are so many things to learn, he may get lost.
transcript: 啊学太学太多了，反而可能迷失自己。

translation: There is little time to study.
transcript: 学习的时间太少。

translation: It's hard to persevere.
transcript: 哦很难持之以恒。

translation: Anything else?
transcript: 呃还有吗？

translation: It's easy to forget what has been learnt.
transcript: 哦学到的东西又太容易忘掉了。

translation: Very good.
transcript: 非常好。

translation: Anything else?
transcript: 还有吗？

translation: What I learn is what I have to learn rather than what I want to learn.
transcript: 哦我学的东西，不得不学的东西，可能并不是我喜欢的东西。

translation: Very good.
transcript: 非常好。

translation: I believe the aforementioned answers have shown many problems we may face today during studying.
transcript: 呃我想这些呢其实给我们展示了在学习中我们今天可能面临的很多问题。

translation: In fact, as many audiences have said before, on the one hand, there is the flood of information.
transcript: 其实大家都刚才都已经谈到了，啊一方面是信息的泛滥。

translation: More new models, concepts and theories emerge.
transcript: 啊越来越多的新的模式、新的概念、新的理论。

translation: Just as the picture illustrated, there is a tremendous amount of books.
transcript: 就像前面刚才那张图片一样，书是浩如烟海哈。

translation: Anyway, I dare not write a book.
transcript: 反正我是不敢写书了。

translation: After I went to the book building in Xidan, I have realized that even if another book has been written, that book will just be like pouring a bowl of water into the sea.
transcript: 我去了一趟西单那个图书大厦之后，我觉得你再写一本儿什么书就是大海里边再泼进去一碗水。

translation: What is the significance and value?
transcript: 有多大的意义和价值呢？

translation: Yes, I dare not write it anymore.
transcript: 啊，已经不敢写了。

translation: Therefore, how can we study more effectively?
transcript: 那么怎么样才能让我们说能够更有效地学习？

translation: Just as someone mentioned, how to study within a limited time?
transcript: 这是我们刚才有人也提到的，有限的时间我们怎么样去学习？

translation: Thirdly, how can we confirm that we've acquired it?
transcript: 第三个来说我们怎么确认我是学到了？

translation: If I forgot it, does it mean that I didn't acquire it?
transcript: 我忘掉了是不是我就没学到呢？

translation: Where are those things that have been acquired?
transcript: 学到的东西在哪里呢？

translation: How to prove that I really acquired it?
transcript: 什么能够证明说我真的学到了？

translation: I attempt to summarize whether there are some rules and principles of learning.
transcript: 那么我自己在总结，说，到底这里边有没有学习的一些规律和原则呢。

translation: Which can truly help us to solve these three problems.
transcript: 能够真的帮到我们支持我们解决这三个问题。

translation: Therefore, influenced by the Beijing "TnDao", I sum up three rules and principles.
transcript: 那么我总结了三道，啊这是受北京“听道”的影响，我总结了三道。

translation: The first principle is reading Dao.
transcript: 第一道呢叫做读道。

translation: The first thing is to read.
transcript: 其实其实要读。

translation: Maybe once we speak of study, reading books come to most people's mind.
transcript: 可能我们大家刚一说到学习，大家想到比较多的可能是读书。

translation: First and foremost, it's to read Dao.
transcript: 那么首先第一呢，是读道。

translation: Secondly, it's what I call listening to Dao.
transcript: 第二，我把它叫做听道。

translation: In fact, today we are just doing one thing, i.e., listening to Dao.
transcript: 其实今天我们就正在做这样一件事情，叫听道。

translation: Thirdly, it is what I call teaching Dao, i.e. telling others what you have learned.
transcript: 第三件事情呢，我把它叫做讲道，就是要把你学到的讲出来。

translation: What does it have to do with studying? I'll share a story with you.
transcript: 那我来分别跟大家做一个分享，这跟我们学习有什么关系？

translation: Once upon a time, I knew a very large Chinese internet company with successful game business.
transcript: 这是有一次中国的一个非常大的网络公司，其实它的游戏也做得非常大。

translation: The head of the company said to me through a friend, "Can you help me find an education expert to help us design the game?"
transcript: 它的老板他通过朋友找到我说：“能不能帮我找一个教育方面的专家，来帮助我们设计游戏。”

translation: It sounds good.
transcript: 哎我听着还挺好哈。

translation: Did he intend to, same to what the former speaker Mr. Su said, add some educational content in the game?
transcript: 他是是不是前面刚才那位苏先生讲的想在游戏里边加入教育的内容呢？

translation: Then, during the chat, he amazed me.
transcript: 然后在这个聊的过程中他告诉了一个让我很吃惊的。

translation: He said, "I also have recruited a group of experts. One of them is very excellent. He is working on the postdoctoral research of biology."
transcript: 他说: “我还找了一群专家，其中有一个人特别牛，是一个生物学的博士后。”

translation: I said, "Why does your game company also need a postdoc in biology? What aspect of biology is he studying on?"
transcript: 我说：“你的游戏公司怎么还找生物学的博士后呢？他是到底是研究生物什么的？”

translation: He said: "He is studying on the happiness mechanism of gorillas."
transcript: 他说：“他是研究大猩猩的快乐机制。”

translation: Hearing his words, I was convinced.
transcript: 我一听这个我服了。

translation: Immediately, I truly understood why games could make so many people addicted to it.
transcript: 我千我就一下子真的明白说游戏为什么能让这么多的人沉迷于其中。

translation: The reason is that the head of the game company is studying on gorillas.
transcript: 因为游戏公司的老板在研究大猩猩。

translation: He also told us that his research field was in fact the most instinctive aspect.
transcript: 但他还告诉我们，他真正研究地那个是最本能的东西。

translation: He designed games based on human instinct, which I believe it's very impressive.
transcript: 他是从本能出发来设计游戏，我觉得这非常非常厉害。

translation: Also, I have participated in some television shows for job-seekers, in the field of human resources.
transcript: 然后我也还注意到因为我呃参加一些职场的节目，我一直在人力资源的这个领域。

translation: I have noticed that many mature business tycoons, and large companies with training capabilities never have recruitment requirements for majors.
transcript: 我注意到好多那些特别成熟的大公司，那些有培训能力的大公司，他们招人的时候不问专业。

translation: After training, they may make a student from department of Chinese language and literature undertake the financial work and a student from the math department become a salesperson.
transcript: 他们有可能说让一个中文系的学生招进来之后，经过他的培训让他做了财务，可能让了一个数学系的同学去做了销售。

translation: What's the rationale behind?
transcript: 这背后是什么？

translation: What does the company seek for?
transcript: 他选的是什么？

translation: It seeks for the most basic competencies and abilities of a person.
transcript: 其实他选的是一个人最最基本的素质和能力。

translation: For example, McKinsey is an investment bank and consultant firm, but it can be seen that it recruits less and less students majoring in finance and accounting.
transcript: 今天你看麦肯锡，他是做投行的，做咨询的，但是在这些做咨询的公司里边，你看不到他们招到，他告诉我们说他们现在招的学金融的，学财务的越来越少。

translation: What kind of talents does it recruit now?
transcript: 招的越来越多的人是什么人？

translation: What kind of talents it needs?
transcript: 是什么？

translation: It needs students majoring in science and engineering.
transcript: 理工科儿的。

translation: Truly, science and engineering.
transcript: 真的是理工科儿的。

translation: Then, the company gives them some special training.
transcript: 然后给他们一些特别的训练。

translation: What abilities does the company take advantage of from the talents?
transcript: 他们用他的是什么能力？

translation: Still the abilities to think critically, to solve problems quickly and learn quickly, and to extend their knowledge and skills.
transcript: 仍然是思辨的能力，发现问题的能力，快速解决问题的能力和快速学习的能力，拓展的能力。

translation: In the future, students majoring in extenics will be more favored.
transcript: 所以可能将来可拓学的学生会受到更多的这个青睐哈。

translation: Therefore, it inspired us. What should we learn?
transcript: 所以呢，这给我了一个启发说那我们学的时候学什么？

translation: In fact, to learn the fundamental knowledge, we should talk about the first principle "reading Dao".
transcript: 其实要学那些根本的东西，也就是回到我前面讲的第1个道，叫读道。

translation: We should read classics.
transcript: 其实要读经典，要读经典。

translation: There are two types of classics.
transcript: 经典有两类。

translation: The first type refers to the classics in your professional field.
transcript: 一类的经典呢，是你所在的这个领域里边的经典。

translation: What are the benefits of classics?
transcript: 经典有什么好处？

translation: Classics don't teach you how to do.
transcript: 因为经典不是教你怎么做的。

translation: Instead, they explain the rationales and reasons.
transcript: 经典告诉你的是这背后的道理是什么，为什么是这样。

translation: I don't know how many audiences' work is relevant to the company management?
transcript: 所以如果，我不知道有多少人是跟企业有关或者做管理？

translation: Also, the audience, who need to learn management, please also raise your hands.
transcript: 也需要学管理的举一下手。

translation: Quite a few.
transcript: 啊还是不少人。

translation: I think to learn management, you should read Drucker's works first, including The Practice of Management and The Effective Executive.
transcript: 我觉得学管理就先读德鲁克，读《管理的实践》，读《卓有成效的领导者》。

translation: The reason why Drucker is called the master of masters in management is that he taught management from the perspective of philosophy with the plainest language.
transcript: 因为德鲁克被称为管理的大师的大师，是因为他用哲学的，用最通俗的哲学语言在讲管理。

translation: Instead of teaching the way to management people, he taught the principles behind management.
transcript: 他没有教你怎么管人，但他讲的是管理的道理。

translation: Therefore, the principles behind management are the fundamental, the essence and cornerstone, which enable you to truly stand high and become far-sighted.
transcript: 所以呢，这个方面的东西，根根本的东西，本质的东西，是基石，这个是能够让你真正站得高，真正能够看得远的东西。

translation: Of course, some people have said that their work is unrelated to their majors.
transcript: 当然有人说了，我的专业好像不大对口。

translation: People always asked me, "Mr. Du, what kind of major should I choose?"
transcript: 也老有人问我说杜老师我到底应该选择什么专业？

translation: I said that if you didn't have any particular and clear preferences, you should purely be engaged in science and engineering or humanities.
transcript: 我说如果你没有一个特别明确的喜欢的东西的话，你就应该学纯粹的理工理科或者是学纯粹的人文的东西。

translation: Today, many heads of company asked: "If I have the opportunity to go back to college, what should I study?"
transcript: 今天也有很多老板说：“我还有机会如果回到大学，我应该学什么？”

translation: I said, "Just forget about the MBA program. As for EMBA, if you don't want to use the diploma to make friends, meet business partners or look for a girlfriend, just forget it, too."
transcript: 我说：“MBA就算了吧，EMBA如果你不是为了找朋友，生意上的朋友或者找女朋友，EMBA就算了吧。”

translation: What should heads of company learn if they are provided with the chance to return to college today?
transcript: 今天的老板如果还有机会回到学院应该学什么？

translation: They should learn philosophy, history, sociology, anthropology, art, and music.
transcript: 应该学哲学，应该学历史，学社会学，学人类学，学艺术，学音乐。

translation: These are the very majors that can make you preeminent.
transcript: 这些东西是能够让你真正能够超越常人的东西。

translation: Therefore, if the time and resources are limited, the first choice for reading books should be Dao, that is, the classics.
transcript: 所以我说第一个读书选择的话，如果有限的时间，有限的资源读什么，读道，读经典。

translation: Since we need to find out the directions in life and work, where is the direction?
transcript: 那么既然说我们都是需要找方向生活需要方向，工作需要方向，方向在哪里？

translation: How can we find the direction quickly within a limited time?
transcript: 在有限的时间我们怎么样能很快的找到方向？

translation: In another example, many people are making investments.
transcript: 其实还有这样一个故事，很多人在做投资。

translation: Today, investment banks are also popular.
transcript: 今天投行也是一个很热的这个这个方向。

translation: Isn't it known to all that nowadays, there is a large amount of money but fewer good projects, is it?
transcript: 大家都知道呃今天是钱多好项目少，对吧？

translation: Then, how can an investor quickly make a judgment in an area he is not familiar with?
transcript: 那么一个投资人怎么样才能够快速地做一个判断，在一个他不熟悉没干过的领域，迅速能够做出判断呢？

translation: There is a Chinese investor who has helped three different companies to go public in the US.
transcript: 中国有一个投资人，他带了三个不同的企业在美国上市。

translation: I am helping young people to start a business now, so we interviewed him.
transcript: 因为我现在是在帮助青年人创业，所以我们采访了他。

translation: He said: "I can confidently say that if you give me three months, I can basically get a clear picture of one industry or field."
transcript: 他说：“我现在可以比较有信心地说，只要给我三个月，我就能把一个行业基本搞清楚。”

translation: He gave an example.
transcript: 他举了一个例子。

translation: What was that example?
transcript: 什么例子呢？

translation: When he entered the hotel industry, he did following things.
transcript: 当他进入酒店行业的时候，旅馆酒店行业的时候，他是这么做的。

translation: Firstly, he read books.
transcript: 首先读。

translation: Of course, there is no classic in the hotel industry.
transcript: 当然酒店行业没有什么经典哈。

translation: So, what did he read?
transcript: 但他读的是什么呢？

translation: He read the biographies of the founders of the most famous hotel brands in the world carefully.
transcript: 他把全世界最著名的这几个酒店品牌的创始人的人物传记，全都认认真真读了一遍。

translation: He was not satisfied with reading those books.
transcript: 读完之后没有停在这儿。

translation: He travelled around the world to visit these founders, and then talked to them, for one or two hours at minimum, and one or two days at maximum.
transcript: 他遍走全世界去找这几个人，然后跟这几个人聊，最短的聊一两个小时，最长的跟他们一起待了一两天。

translation: These people were very willing to tell him all the experience over the decades.
transcript: 这些人很愿意把他自己几十年经历的各种各样的。

translation: In addition to the successful experience, they also told him frustrations especially and insights.
transcript: 除了成功之外，特别是很多的坎坷，中间他们悟到的东西都告诉了他。

translation: He didn't stop yet.
transcript: 他还没有终止。

translation: He also found other people and listened to their stories.
transcript: 他又找了一些人听这些人说。

translation: Who were those people?
transcript: 是什么人呢？

translation: It could be staff in a hotel.
transcript: 是一个旅馆。

translation: He might ask the hotel receptionist to tell him about her working experience and the way to cope with clients.
transcript: 可能他想类似的这样的旅馆的前台小姐跟她讲，她工作的感觉，她是怎么应对客户的。

translation: He talked to the elderly cleaner who was responsible for room cleaning and the client who just entered the hotel lobby.
transcript: 他跟那个打扫房间的大姐聊，他跟那个刚刚走进酒店大堂的客人聊。

translation: After the chat, he said that he knew about the industry.
transcript: 聊完之后他说我知道这行业是怎么回事儿了。

translation: Therefore, it is to listen Dao.
transcript: 所以呢，这是听。

translation: We should listen to those who have experienced ups and downs and accumulated insights, listen to the essence of their knowledge and experience.
transcript: 听这些走过的人，听这些已经积累有感悟的人，把他们最干的东西拿过来。

translation: Just like the speech here today, many people tell us about their wisdom and the experience of life, and we obtain it in the shortest time.
transcript: 这就像在今天在这儿一样，很多人把他们的智慧把他们的人生的体验告诉我们，我们在最短的时间快速地获得。

translation: As a Chinese saying goes, "Talking with you for one moment is much better than reading books for ten years".
transcript: 中国有句话说，呃“听君一席话，胜读十年书”。

translation: I believe it is the same with study.
transcript: 我想是一样的道理。

translation: Of course, sometimes, we may say that the investors own wealth and their companies are listed in the U.S, so it's easy for them to find those celebrities.
transcript: 当然有的时候我们说，哎呀，你看这些人投资人嘛有钱，啊他这个又美国上市，可能找到这样一些名家也容易。

translation: How should we ordinary people do?
transcript: 我们老百姓怎么做这些事情呢？

translation: How should we ordinary people do?
transcript: 我们普通人怎么做呢？

translation: One of my colleagues enlightened me.
transcript: 我的一个同事给了我一个启发。

translation: When his daughter was choosing the major for college, he didn't seek help from education experts.
transcript: 在他的女儿准备上大学选专业的时候，他没有去找教育专家。

translation: He phoned seven or eight friends, and I was one of them.
transcript: 他给他自己的朋友，七八个朋友打了电话，我是其中之一。

translation: He said: "Kui Du, can you give me a hand? My daughter is going to fill in a college application form. Can you spend two hours talking to her? You don't need to tell her what major she should choose. Please just tell her the way you reach your present position. At present, what makes you feel happy, helpless, painful and unsatisfied?"
transcript: 他说：“杜葵，你能不能帮我一下，我女儿要报志愿了，你拿出两个小时来，能不能拿两个小时跟她聊一聊？你不用告诉她应该选什么专业，你就告诉她，你是怎么做到今天这个位置的，在这个位置上什么东西让你快乐，什么东西让你无奈，有的时候给你痛苦，有什么让你讨厌的东西吗？”

translation: The people he phoned include heads of the company, the senior management, ordinary people, secretaries, the government officials, and the housewives.
transcript: 他找的这些人，有企业的老板，有企业的高层管理者，也有普通的，有做秘书的，啊也有企业也有政府官员，也有甚至是家庭主妇。

translation: He even let his daughter talk to housewives.
transcript: 让她去聊。

translation: After the chat, the girl chose her major with ease and confidence.
transcript: 聊完之后，这个孩子非常从容、自信地选择了她自己的专业。

translation: In my opinion, this father is very smart, because he knows that we, and our children, are actually not choosing majors.
transcript: 我想这个父亲很聪明，因为他知道其实人我们选的我们自己和我们的孩子其实选的都不是专业。

translation: What are we choosing?
transcript: 我们选的是什么？

translation: We are choosing different lives, and states of life.
transcript: 我们选的是人生，我们选择的是一种生活状态。

translation: What she should see is the state of life rather than the content of a major.
transcript: 所以她应该看到的是一种生活状态而不是那个专业是干嘛的是学什么的。

translation: The reason is that there are various states of life in one profession.
transcript: 因为在每一个职业里边都有很多人生状态。

translation: Therefore, I always tell people that it is not the major or profession that matters.
transcript: 所以我一直说专业不重要，职业也不重要。

translation: The way you want to live matters.
transcript: 重要的是你想怎么活着。

translation: How can we get those information?
transcript: 而这些东西从哪里来？

translation: Listen to Dao.
transcript: 听道。

translation: There is another interesting question for you.
transcript: 我再问大家一个有意思的话题哈。

translation: Can you tell me how many ways to tie the shoelaces?
transcript: 各位你们谁能告诉我鞋带儿有多少种系法吗？

translation: Please speak out aloud how many ways you know.
transcript: 就你知道几种来大声说一下。

translation: Oh, just one.
transcript: 哦，才一种啊。

translation: Is there anyone who knows more than three ways?
transcript: 有没有三种以上的？

translation: Congratulations on those audiences who know more than three ways.
transcript: 哦，有三种以上的恭喜哈。

translation: I will tell you the answer later.
transcript: 啊我等一下告诉你们这个谜底。

translation: A few years ago, I went to a friend's family.
transcript: 呃几年前我去一个朋友家里边。

translation: He has a kid who went to elementary school, probably in Grade Three or Four, but he couldn't tie the shoelaces well.
transcript: 他有一个孩子都上到小学好像是三年级四年级了，但鞋带儿老系不好。

translation: That day, his father said to him again, "You are such a big man, why can't you tie the shoelaces well?"
transcript: 我去的那天呢他的父亲又在说他，说：“你都这么大了一男孩子，怎么鞋带都系不好啊？”

translation: My major is education anyway, right?
transcript: 好歹我也算学教育的，对吧？

translation: However, I didn't know how to teach him to tie his shoelaces.
transcript: 当然我也不知道该怎么系教他系鞋带。

translation: Neither did I know why he couldn't do it well.
transcript: 我不知道他的问题在哪。

translation: I suggested that we motivate the boy in another way.
transcript: 我说咱们能不能鼓励一下换一种方法来激发这孩子。

translation: "Hey," I said, "Xiaopeng, I don't know how to tie the shoelaces, neither. Next time I come, can you teach me how to tie my shoelaces?"
transcript: 哎，我说，小朋，我说你能不能等杜叔叔下次来的时候，我的鞋带儿也老系不好，你能不能教我怎么系鞋带儿？

translation: His interest was stimulated immediately.
transcript: 诶他马上来了兴趣。

translation: When I visited again, I said, "Xiaopeng, have you puzzled out how to tie shoelaces?"
transcript: 然后等到下一次我去他们家，我说：“小朋，你想好你知道这鞋带儿怎么系了吗？”

translation: He said: "Oh! Uncle Du, I know it so well."
transcript: 他说：“哎呀！杜叔叔我太知道了。”

translation: He said: "Uncle Du, can you guess how many kinds of ways are there?"
transcript: 他说：“杜叔叔，你猜一下鞋带有多少种系法？”

translation: I said: "Three."
transcript: 我说：“三种。”

translation: He said: "No, let me tell you."
transcript: 他说：“不对，我告诉你这个数。”

translation: It is two hundred.
transcript: 两百种。

translation: I was astonished at the time, but I only asked him a simple question.
transcript: 我当时都惊了，但是我当时只考了他一个简单问题。

translation: I said, "Uncle Du's shoelaces always come loose. I know how to tie them, but can you tell me how to deal with the loose shoelaces?"
transcript: 我说：“杜叔叔的鞋带儿呢它老开，我知道怎么系但是它老开怎么办？”

translation: He said: "It's just a piece of cake."
transcript: 他说：“简单。”

translation: He said: "If you go right over left for the first knot, then for the second knot, you should go left over right. The reason is that we basically tie the shoelaces in one direction, so you just need to make the knots in opposite directions.
transcript: 他说：“你只需要系第一个扣的时候如果是右压左，返回来的时候你一定要左压右，因为我们基本上都是在一个方向上系，你只要两个方向正好相反。”

translation: I asked, "How does it work?"
transcript: 唉我说：“这为什么这样就可以了呢？”

translation: He said: "Doesn't the key to tying shoelaces lie in increasing friction?"
transcript: 他说：“哎呀！系鞋带儿不就是增加摩擦力吗？”

translation: I knew the boy already obtained the "Dao" for tying shoelaces.
transcript: 我知道这孩子得“道”了，他得了这个系鞋带儿的这个“道”了。

translation: When he truly comprehended the "Dao", he could teach others. Only when you are able to teach others, can you truly understand the "Dao".
transcript: 他真的悟到这个“道”的时候，也就是说他能教别人的了时候你才有机会真的悟到这个“道”。

translation: Every one, after my speech today, I hope you can tell the aforementioned three principles of Dao to others.
transcript: 那么各位，其实还是哈，今天讲完我期待的是你们回去能把这三道先讲给你。

translation: If you return home, please tell your family first.
transcript: 今天如果你是回家的话，先讲给你的家人。

translation: Tomorrow, you may tell your colleagues.
transcript: 也许明天可以讲给你的同事。

translation: If there is any chance, you can tell the public and strangers.
transcript: 如果还有机会把这些东西讲给公众，讲给你可能不认识的人。

translation: I believe that when all of you talk about them, then there will emerge more than three principles of Dao.
transcript: 因为我相信当你们都讲了之后，就一定不止三道。

translation: There can be four, five, seven, and seventy.
transcript: 可能有四道、五道、七道、七十道。

translation: Thank you!
transcript: 谢谢！
